code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useScrollDirection}from'../../hooks/useScrollAnimation';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);const[mobileMenuOpen,setMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);const scrollDirection=useScrollDirection();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setScrolled(window.scrollY>50);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header ".concat(scrolled?'scrolled':''," ").concat(scrollDirection==='down'?'hide':'show'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"#home",className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-rocket"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"CareerConnect"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav-links ".concat(mobileMenuOpen?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",className:"nav-link",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#opportunities",className:"nav-link",children:"Opportunities"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#dashboard",className:"nav-link",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#companies",className:"nav-link",children:"Companies"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#resources",className:"nav-link",children:"Resources"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Sign Up"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"mobile-menu-btn ".concat(mobileMenuOpen?'active':''),onClick:()=>setMobileMenuOpen(!mobileMenuOpen),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})]})});};export default Header;
